thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Mandy Quinones
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Mandy Quinones

author: Mandy Quinones
title: Mandy Quinones
text: Pura Vida! We just returned from the most wonderful vacation we have yet to take. This being the first time we had used a full service travel company to plan a vacation we were a bit nervous... I can say this was the best decision ever. Costa Rica Vacations planned the most amazing trip for us. We are a family of 4 with older children (17 & 21) and all of us truly enjoyed the trip and tours Leah helped us plan. Everything was just as Leah described. The travel guides, accommodations, excursions, meals and everything in between was perfect. We will definitely be looking to book other destinations through this company.
